content.title: Safe, enjoyable holidays - discover our holiday ideas

content.textLeft:
Be inspired by our ideas for your holiday in a holiday home and find the perfect villa, chalet or apartment for your stay: enjoy a holiday without compromise, with more space and freedom than a hotel.

Interhome holiday accommodation meets all your individual wishes and needs. You can choose from a spacious holiday home with pool, a villa by the sea, a cosy chalet in the mountains, a detached holiday home as an ideal retreat in the countryside or a holiday apartment directly in the city centre.

Here you will certainly find the right inspiration for your next holiday.
content.textRight:
That is why a holiday in a holiday home or apartment is the right choice for you:

Holidays in a holiday home stand for freedom and independence, beginning with your individual arrival in your own car.

Be your own boss and enjoy your privacy, undisturbed.

You don’t have to share your accommodation and have the option to cater for yourself.

Design your own holiday without missing all the comfort, quality and security of home.

Relax on your holiday: you are in good hands. Make the most of personal assistance and a safe, yet hassle-free, hand-over of the key.

>> That's how safe you are in your holiday home! Find out more here

elements.title: Why Interhome
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, feel the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or the Spanish way of life. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online - quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your holiday home
elements.caption: Your stay in a holiday house or a holiday apartment offers plenty of advantages: spend your time exactly as you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Simply enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your holiday home.
